website_summaries.verdict: Highly-rated for its functional size and build, this inexpensive carrier offers a top-quality product at an affordable price.
pros: Can hold pets up to 12 pounds
Hands-free design makes for a simple carrying experience
Multiple color options available for purchase
cons: Some customers claimed the fabric was too flimsy for their pet to feel secure

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The left pup is 35# the right pup is #15 This sling is great. I have a 15# miniature pinscher who wants to carried more often than not and she loves it! There is plenty of room to spare also. Fleece lined, good quality and comfy for me to wear. The adjustable strap makes it nice too. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: My dog weighs 8.8 lbs
customer_reviews.text: My dog only weights 8.8 lbs and while she does fit....it seems awkward. Seems like she feels non stable in the item and feels like a lot of weight in it. One thing that I was concerned about from previous reviews was how low it would hang as I am only 5 foot 2 inches. The carrier hangs perfectly....just like a purse would. Other than the feeling of lots of weight and feeling like it would lean to the side, item is nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag!! We've used it for airplane travel, grocery stores, hiking. My pup loves it and is very happy and comfortable in it even though she is 11 lbs she fits well. She looks like she can pop out but the bag is deep and she always has to hang one paw. I also always clip her in. It can start hurting my shoulder if I wear for too long and I wish there was a pocket for my id/money. But overall great quality. And very stylish compared to those hideous front pack dog carriers lol and I love that it's machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Be careful and read thoroughly.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. There are two models of this item. One of them is "adjustable," which means that you can lengthen or shorten the strap according to the dog's size, your height, where it is comfortable to carry, or not. I bought one of the adjustable ones and loved it; ordered what I thought was another of the same, and it turns out to be NON-adjustable, so that that the dog ends up suspended about chest-high on me, and makes it worthless. Weird that they would have both models for sale, same price without emphasizing the differences. Forget this one: buy the adjustable one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: TURNED MY DOG BLUE
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sling. I like it a lot. Except that I HAVE A WHITE DOG and the DYE on the fabric inside the pouch leaks apparently because it STAINED MY DOG MULTIPLE TIMES! The first time, I thought it might just be that he got himself dirty and that I was imagining the blue hue. Now I’m sure of it. He likes the pouch but I’m not sure it’s worth all of the bath time & scrubbing. IF YOU HAVE A WHITE or LIGHT COLORED DOG, THIS MAY NOT BE THE DOG SLING FOR YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Lee

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my pomeranian who is 12 pounds and its comfortable for me and him. It makes taking him places easier and its also something that if he gets it dirty I can just put it in the washer machine. Love this and got so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Lucci

customer_reviews.title: which I also don't like. Otherwise the fleece is OK (it's not a ...
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come as described. Picture had a metal ring that showed it was adjustable, and was even described as adjustable height. It's a solid sewn piece of fabric from one end to the other and is not adjustable. I'm 5'3" and even without my 7lb cat, it hands at my crotch. With my cat, it's halfway down my thighs. It's quite roomy. The polka dots are printed, so you can feel the texture, which I also don't like. Otherwise the fleece is OK (it's not a super fuzzy fleece, it's more like a hoody fleece).
customer_reviews.author: Isabel W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for chubby dogs too!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! My dog also loved it from the moment I put her in it. She is a 12 lb. dachshund who is about 12 years old and still enjoys her walks. Although she is very enthusiastic about going out, she becomes tired pretty quickly and I have been forced to carry her back home, I wouldn't mind but my arms get sore. Taking her on shorter walks is kind of a burden because I could use the exercise and I have another dog who could walk many miles. Very cute bag, and my dog is super comfy. <3 <3 <3
customer_reviews.author: EasyBakeOven

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give it a big fat zero!
customer_reviews.text: First, I agree with all of those who commented there are no directions for how to use this product, especially to fasten the straps. I printed the picture and tried to loop through the rings the way it is in the picture. No luck. I fastened it, though; but, it is not as pretty as in the picture. More importantly, it is open at the top! Good grief! That isn't clear in the photos I saw. I expected a zipper or Velcro or some kind of fastener. Needless to say, I don't trust this thing at all to keep my cat safely secured and I will not be taking Inky outside in it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Bird

customer_reviews.title: The best dog carrier, for real!
customer_reviews.text: We carry our Chihuahua, Taco, EVERYWHERE in this. He even sleeps in it sometimes, using it as a hammock. He rides around in this to the grocery store, restaurants, theaters, sporting events, shopping malls. Everyone stops me and asks who made it and how to buy one. I should get a commission. I refer people to Amazon.com and Alfie Pet practically daily. It's an awesome bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Brines

customer_reviews.title: Love this little sling for my Papillon! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my little 8lb Papillon! I bought this in July 2016 and it worked perfect for our trip to Philly! The pavement was too hot in the city, but Sierra was super happy in her little sling. She settled right down and even let her little paws hang out over the side. Too cute! I marched with her about 3 hours using this sling and the wide band was remarkably comfortable on my shoulder. It was VERY hot but this sling was breathable and didn't make me or Sierra overheat. Afterwards, the sling washed just fine in the washing machine and we line dried it. Thank You for the great comfortable sling!
customer_reviews.author: Guppy-Addict

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! My 14-year old/10-pound malshi loves it. The gray/jean combo was a great choice. The gray fabric is nice and soft and it keeps her cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ramos

customer_reviews.title: 13lb Pug approved
customer_reviews.text: We adopted our little girl 3 days ago. She is 3 years old and 13 lbs. She fell asleep inside of this within 5 minutes. She's not all the way in there but she could fit and snuggle if she wanted to. I think this is going to be perfect for many of our outings. The only thing that I would like them to do is adjust the placement of the Rings. They sit right on top of my collarbone, but it should work okay with just a little padding from the left over strap placed underneath. The material is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: TrackDoll

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for Yorkie owners.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use with my 4 lb Yorkie, Rambo and we love it! It's adjustable, so my husband has it fastened high enough that when Rambo is in his sling, (where he loves to be when he us reading, playing video games or just relaxing around the house) is tucked up under his left arm. That way, he can keep his paw in my husband's my hand while he sleeps. He is very content to watch the world from his secure perch where he can feel Dad's hearbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice design
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice design, although it is a bit deep for small dogs. I have a 10lb and a 7lb morkie
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Probably for very small pets only?
customer_reviews.text: I actually really liked this product in and of itself. I thought it was well-made, comfortable, and I loved that it was adjustable. Very important for shorties like me. However, I don't see how this sling could be comfortable with anything other than a very light little pet. I tried putting my 8 lb frenchie-pug puppy in it, and she liked it, but unfortunately my neck became unbearably sore after only about 10 minutes. :( I hope sometime they come out with a design for these slings that can somehow have two shoulder straps, or have some other feature that makes it more ergonomic. I'd be a returning customer for sure then. Oh well, it was worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Pup Approves
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, put together nicely, reverses nicely. The only dislikes are the length on the sling. I will be fine carrying it, however, I have a larger chest so its a big snug, my husband would not be able to carry it because it would be too short for him. He is 5'10" 180lbs. The other is the "safety" clasp so the pup can't fall out. It doesn't come with directions so I will have to check the site to find out where it snaps on. I'm sure it isn't difficult but I could not find any hook to secure it on the inside, outside or around the bag.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleMac

customer_reviews.title: It was okay...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure with worthy with $20. It just looks fancy walk with picture (with small dog) I ordered because of reviews - people wear this bag with their dog looks good. Reality - He couldn't be in comfort inside so I needed to hold him by hand. When I carry this bag with my dog, the bag was slowly going down. It was annoying. My dog is only 3 pound. Also, I tried to wash this bag but I can't use the washing machine because I can't remove the metal things in the bag. feels waste money. Do not throw away the wrapping paper before you try. I can't return it because I throw away wrapping paper...
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and comes loose.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over 8 months now and I find the buckle digs into my shoulder A LOT. Also, the buckle can very easily loose tension making for a dangerous situation whereby the pup or baby can easily fall to the ground. This company should definitely include instructions on how to use these carriers. And they should rethink the giant buckle system that seriously digs into tour chest. Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marufaru

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Sling
customer_reviews.text: This is well-made carrier for any small animal. Our Jack Russell is over 13 years and slowing down. She loves to go on walks but can't make it very far so she just stops. Done. Not walkin' no more. This sling makes it a lot easier to carry 16 lbs of dog. The ring adjustment is super easy to use and can accomodate my wife (5'-9") or me (6'-3"). The fabric is soft with an inner liner. We haven't washed it yet but it will have to be hung dry since the metal ring is permanently sewn in. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: E. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: He is adorable looking up at me while I work on the computer.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 lb Chi Randi LOVES THIS. I put it over my shoulder, lay it part way open on my lap and he CRAWLS IN!!! He is adorable looking up at me while I am on the computer. Much safer than having him lay freely on my lap as he sometimes starts to slip off. I also like the ability to take him with me knowing he is secure right next to me. The bag is soft and has comfy lining. The strap, although there is no extra cushion, is somehow comfortable. Maybe it is due to the width of the strap, it does not dig into me when Randi is riding. The bad: He doesn't want to get out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ray

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: i really liked this at first but the strap comes out of the loops too easily and there is a split in the ring that the fabric gets caught in and it is very difficult to get it out without tearing the fabric. But my dogs love it and will lay on their backs like a human in a hammock. It is well made besides the strap ring problems. i do recommend this item but you'll need to knot the strap and adjust the rings to make it or comfortable for the humans.
customer_reviews.author: Evile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I got it so it will be easier ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I got it so it will be easier to do things with her with me like shopping or working. (I get to bring her to work) Now I would like other colors to coordinate with my outfits. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: imauburn

customer_reviews.title: Good fit on body and soft material
customer_reviews.text: Great design, but my cats are not into it like I thought they would be given their desire to set with me all the time. Maybe a little more practice/training with it and they will come around. Doesn't dig into neck. Good height on body so they are not hanging at your low belly. That was my main concern because this way they could set in it at my desk and be close to my body but not get in the way. Or I could work at stove or counter and they would be in way of my arms.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie McGrew

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This functioned just as it was meant to, not to mention after washing with no special care it was like new. Purchased this to be able to carry around and attend a runt kid goat that needed hourly attention after the mother refused it and it helped a ton. Took it to work, hiking, and out to dine lol
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I got it when she was 4 lbs. She would hang her head over it. She is 5.5 lbs now and it is still her favorite way to travel. It has pilled somewhat. But it was so cheap I will just replace it in time. Still loving it. I also found some custom ones on dachshund websites that are amazing. They are much more expensive tho so for the price this is still an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 lb dog that just has to be either in my arms or on my lap, so when I need two hands to cook with, this was the perfect solution. It's a little too long for my 5 foot frame, so I just pinned up the strap and it fits perfectly. My dog absolutely loves the sling and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Eichler

customer_reviews.title: And they both seem to be very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had a photo- but my 3yr old Yorkie loves me carrying her in this and so does my Schnauzer. (Which it was meant for my schnauzer because she is 14weeks old and has never been w/o me yet) But it's much easier for me to use than my old doggie backpack carrier. And they both seem to be very comfortable...and so am I. It's not heavy at all ! I can walk any where for as long as needed w/o her trying to jump out or reposition herself. So I'm glad I noticed these when scrolling on Amazon last week. Very helpful for our lifestyle. I wasn't expecting it to work so well- but it really does.
customer_reviews.author: Zina Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sling - great for carrying my fur baby around.
customer_reviews.text: My 10# Morkie Poo loves her new sling, it is perfect for her. I carry her everywhere we go. Yes she is spoiled. I began doing research for something that would make it easier on the both of us. After reading all of the reviews, I knew I should buy it. The material is a soft lined fleece made of great quality. The strap is adjustable and very comfortable to wear across my shoulder. This item is highly recommended for anyone who carries around their pet like a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Melika03

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it 10 stars I would...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a brand new puppy I got because I was going to be bringing her to work a few times a week. What I didn’t know was how often I would use it. When she wants to be held but I need to clean or do something that requires standing, it is so helpful. It is made out of very soft and durable material and she absolutely loves it. It’s one of the best purchases I made in preparation of bringing her home. I can’t think of anything I could complain about. It is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Neal

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable and big enough for 2 small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Well, Its safe to say, my 2 Maltese love this bag. My smallest dog (Issa) is 3 months and 3 pounds and the oldest (Peter) is 2 years and 10 pounds. They both fit fine. The puppy just likes laying on top of Peter so she can see better lol Obviously the bag can start to bother your shoulder a bit if you have too much weight, but it's super comfortable, cute and best of all, my pets love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this sling. I just received it in the mail yesterday and my little Yorkie puppy is having a great time riding in it. the only thing I would is the rings that you put the sling through. They are big and hurt my shoulder. I am going to have to work a bit with the tension so the rings are in the back and not on my shoulder but other than that I am impressed and so is my puppy who is sound asleep in the sling as I write.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Mitts

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: My toy poodle loves her carry bag! My dog is 10 pounds and she just fits. She doesn't fuss inside and this reduces her anxiety because she's right next to me the whole time. The fabric is soft, padded, good quality, and very comfortable to wear. The strap is adjustable. I would have preferred the ring on the strap to be smaller or padded. After a long while it digs into my collar bone, but I used the excess strap fabric to wrap around the ring to provide some comfort. I would recommend to anyone. Great buy and price!
customer_reviews.author: 4myday

customer_reviews.title: Good start...
customer_reviews.text: My Italian Greyhound puppy only got to use this twice before we had to upgrade to a larger one. I wish they had netting around with a string to secure the little thing in. It made me really nervous so that was something I looked for in the next purchase. But with all that said. MY little LAMBKINS loved this and it was a great babysitter as I was preparing for the holidays with not be able to stop and bond and see to her every wish.
customer_reviews.author: Debora D

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie puppy loves riding in this with me. I am able to carry her in stores in it and she is safe and contained. I take her for walks and when she gets tired i put her in it. Then my husband and I can get out workout in. Its super soft, easy to clean. I have washed ten times and it is still brightly colored. My Yorkie snuggles down into it. Then when she wants to look out she pops out. It is big enough to hold her as she gets to full grown. I am super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for full grown miniature Dachshund
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a miniature dachshund wondering if it would be large enough to comfortably accommodate their longer bodies. My dachshund Is around 10 pounds and has plenty or room to curl up, sit up or hang one paw out while she is looking around. Nice thick padding along the length of the shoulder prevents shoulder and neck fatigue even after several hours. The Carrier is also great for taking with you when out for a walk in case your fur baby gets tired. Easily machine washes and comes out soft and looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Ownedbyadachshund

customer_reviews.text: My pup loves it! Kinda. I will say it’s kinda awkward for my 7lb puppy because he just has to have his head and arms hanging out. I usually keep a little blanket in there to prop him up comfortably but I take my pup everywhere and have been using this carrier for 2 months now. It definitely shows it’s wear but does the job! Some sort of cushion/prop was very necessary when he was 3-6pounds and he only recent grew big enough to sit in it comfortably (we live in a very warm climate so having him in with a blanket is not always ideal and limited the usage. Now that we’re approaching cooler months it’s not an issue)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend 🐶
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The only issue is that the O-ring digs into me when I wear it correctly. I wear it backwards and it pretty much eliminates the problem. It seems very comfortable for my dog and, turned backwards, is comfortable for me too. The wide shoulder strap helps to distribute the weight so I can carry her for longer periods of time. Seems well-made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: For the dog lovers that always want their pooch with ...
customer_reviews.text: For the dog lovers that always want their pooch with them! Sadly I couldn't use it because my dog is around 20 lbs and once he got in he made a ripping noise and that was a no go. Plus if I kept wearing it, it would've killed my back with that heavy dog// But gave it to a friend and she likes to do chores with it so her dog can be with her.
customer_reviews.author: Babyytop

customer_reviews.title: Great fit even for a 17lb dog!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I was worried it wouldn't work for my elderly 17lb Cavvie but he fits in the sling great and seems very comfortable! Great for having to carry him up and down the stairs so he can go to the bathroom. 10/10 would recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I love this & I promise she does too! I’ve tried about 15 different carriers and bags. This is my favorite, I think for both of us. I love that it’s hands free. Ariel is a pekingese mix. She’s 20” head to tail and is about 10-11 lbs. There’s plenty of room for her. I like the inside material, it’ll be easy to clean! Very comfortable and I like the adjustable aspect. I don’t know how comfortable it’ll be for long periods of time, however I also think it depends on your dog size/weight. I’m really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever for small pups.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pouch. I did a road trip to pick up my pup and right away she felt comfortable and safe being with me. I put a small blanket inside to make her extra cozy. It made it very easy for me to do what I needed knowing she was safe and clipped in. Now as she is growing up in it she likes it cause she knows she will be with mommy.
customer_reviews.author: SebastianPhoto

customer_reviews.title: 20lb Cat Approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It arrived on time and well packaged. At first I was a little upset because I thought I ordered the one with the adjustable strap. However this one did end up fitting my shoulder and is not stuck in my armpit! I have a 20lb cat and he fits just fine and there hasn’t been any rips or tears in the sling. My cat and I go for walks pretty much everyday and he has grown to love the sling!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: i knew it came with a thing to attach to the dogs harness to keep them from jumping out and taking off but i thought it would come already attached. its not. its separate and im not sure what to do with it because theres no where inside to attach it. its weird. but my dog likes it. shes 8 pounds and hangs off the side and watches what i am doing. not the biggest fan of the inside lining that looks like blue jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie & Slober

customer_reviews.title: Great doggy carry sling
customer_reviews.text: This pet sling is very well made. Soft material, easily adjustable. My 6.5 pound chihuahua settled right into it....to the point of falling asleep. TWICE! From my pets perspective, it's comfortable to sit and lay in. From my perspective, it's comfortable to wear, so win-win for us both. I've already used this around the office which has been convenient with having to get up and down with a pet in my lap. I plan on using it in stores and while hiking if he gets tired and I need to carry him. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PET CARRIER. Just Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, previous reviewers, for all of your great comments! I purchased this before taking my little 8 lb. Yorkie-poo across the country and it was a life-saver in all the airports and stores. She loves it, though she won't lay all the way inside; keeps her head out to watch everything going on. I love that it's easily adjustable because I've used it at several different lengths. I may sew it in place once I find the ideal length for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Love!  Love!  Love!
customer_reviews.text: This sling is just the best ever!!! My new puppy loves to travel in this sling. She is tiny and only weighs 2 pounds, so she can stretch out when she wants. I have a small frame (5'4", 134 lbs) and the sling hits me perfectly at the hips/waist area, which feels very comfortable for me. I love that the sling is reversible! I will get a lot of use out of this product! It is great quality at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.author: Sledge

customer_reviews.title: Best of All the Pet Slings Out There!
customer_reviews.text: I love Alfie Pets slings, I own 3 and this one is by far the best. I love that it is adjustable and the material is much more cool than the other Alfie slings that I own which consist of a sweatshirt like material. This sling is not only adjustable but has much more room for the dog. I can fit my 2, 5 lb. dogs in here together and they are comfortable. I take the puppy everywhere in this thing and she just sinks into it instantly like a little hammock. Oh to be a dog these days!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymar

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly cats, too!
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat is very happy in this sling and my back very much appreciated the relief and carting her around with me on a daily basis. Bit big for her at seven pounds, but she doesn't seem to mind the extra room and does like to hide in it from time to time. I definitely would recommend this to anyone with a needy critter who just wants to be held all the time. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Kym Cherry 🍒

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a lifesaver. I have a 12year old chihuahua, he’s 6 lbs. Just adopted a 3 year old 60 lb female American Bulldog. I have used this sling around the house as they are still getting familiar with each other. My new girl loves going on walks. My senior boy not so much but he doesn’t want to be left behind. This sling allows me to easily take him with us on her walks. I did have to sew the strap to make it shorter. He wasn’t comfortable down on my hip but now that he’s closer to my chest he doesn’t fight it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi D

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: for our little 5 pound Maltese-Yorkie mix. She's a small dog, she loves being outside and I walk our pitbull two times a day. Didn't want to leave the little one out so this was a great solution. With people here seeming to not believe in leashing their dogs, I didn't feel safe letting the little one walk. This was a great solution as she likes coming along with us for our walks. She just looks around and seems comfortable in the sling. Much better than carrying her around in a pet carrier. It easily adjusts yet stays tight.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond

customer_reviews.title: SUPER USEFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This is super handy. We got a new puppy and it's so easy to pop him in there and it frees up your hands to get what you need done when you go out! It's a thick material and not flimsy at all! My sister thought this would be a waste of money but she even admits it's super handy and a great buy! Get it! You wont' regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Prefect solution for my senior dog
customer_reviews.text: This is wondeful. My 13 year old dog can go to the beach with us now and I dont have to worry about him getting too tired or hot. I bought three different kinds of carriers at the same time and this was the only one that worked for us. Charles is about 14 pounds and fairly tall. He loves it, usually falls asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fields

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and my extra clingy Brussels loves to ride around in this all day. She’s a chubby 14 lbs so she does get heavy after a while but it makes her so happy. The only thing that I would complain about is the ring to tighten it. I’m 5’2” so I need to pull it fairly small and the ring sits right at the boniest part of my shoulder and hurts after a while. I have started putting a cloth there to pad it but otherwise it’s excellent!
customer_reviews.author: NRTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Washing is easy. The shoulder strap is comfortable and possible could ...
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and very roomy. Somewhat too roomy for a very small dog. The pocket needs to be padded. It would also be helpful to have a hard insert for the bottom for support,it can be removable as desired. A small zipper or snaps at the top (opening may also be considered as a safety measure to prevent the puppy from slipping out. The strap with the lead clip is helpful but not enough to safely contain the puppy. Washing is easy. The shoulder strap is comfortable and possible could be adjustable for length. It is pretty, and the puppy does like to be held closely.
customer_reviews.author: Marian M Wolfert

customer_reviews.title: This is probably great for <15lb dogs
customer_reviews.text: Helped us during the early pre-vaccination phase to get our puppy out and socialized with out letting him on the ground. The denim color did however come off on our white lab's coat (came out in a bath) so we had to put pup in a large pillow case to line the inside. This is probably great for <15lb dogs, anything over you will get a sore shoulder from the rings and fabric digging in.
customer_reviews.author: jjk

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves being carried around
customer_reviews.text: This pet sling did meet most of my expectations. My 8lb chi-pom rescue fits comfortably with room to move around and adjust. It seems washable which is fantastic. The only thing I don't like is the extra little hook/harness strap. There's no way for it to connect to the sling and the dog's collar. I just don't use it. Overall, it's a fun way to bring my dog to dog friendly establishments like Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: kj808

customer_reviews.title: This carrier is awesome! My 11 lb
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is awesome! My 11 lb. Chi/terrier fits fine and he relaxes once he's in it. It would hold bigger dog if you can handle the weight. The wide strap allows you to rest it on your shoulder when carrying for long periods so that you don't get that heavy purse strap digging in your neck. Fabric does not stretch which makes less bouncing for dog. It's adjustable for different height people and metal ring may dig into your clavicle for shorter person. I'm 5'8" and rings sat lower and comfortable- like picture. Best of all when not in use just roll it up -very compact.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: It works - Adjustable strap is a necessity.
customer_reviews.text: My little guy is 10 lbs and loves it. He comes right over when he sees me put it on and could hang out there all day feeling like he’s the tallest dog in the world. You’d think his legs are purely decorative from the way he acts. The adjustable strap is essential to avoid having it hang too low. I got a second after a new little dog happened into our life and the new guy loves his sling too. We use a knot to hold the strap in place.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is perfect for both my morkies, the biggest being 12 pounds. It's deep and wide enough for them to ride comfortably. The only issue I have is that the shoulder strap is not adjustable. I'm 5"3" and it's just a bit too long to hang comfortably at my side, it was closer to my knee. I did take the strap in and it's perfect now, but it's something to consider if you are vertically challenged like me.
customer_reviews.author: S Simmons

customer_reviews.title: A more masculine sling for your puppy
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a bunch of slings and pouches for my very small puppy/dog and liked this the best. I wanted a way to take the dog to places that were not friendly to a tiny animal on a leash and this seems perfect. I wanted a bag that was not girly. This one fits the bill. The denim is thin and likely a blend, the liner is brown and feels like sweatshirt material. I'm happy with the choice and comfortable with the look.
customer_reviews.author: Foxglove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for puppies
customer_reviews.text: We used this sling to take our Corgi puppy out and about for safe socialization before she had completed all her shots. She outgrew it (got too long and over 14 lbs) right around 16 weeks, so we are putting it in storage until future puppies come along. I'm 5' tall, my husband is over 6', and it worked for both of us. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Z

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this product was wrong for me.
customer_reviews.text: This was just trash. Too deep, too floppy, too much weight on the shoulder. This is simply not a good format carrier if your pet weighs more than 6 pounds. I returned it. The material was nice, but the adjustable strap was ass. The ring is just not a good fit for adjusting on the go, or with an animal in the bag and it seem to move about.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Li

customer_reviews.title: Nice puppy bag
customer_reviews.text: Very factionable bag and our puppy feels comfortable and secure in it
customer_reviews.author: N.T.

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty well made
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty well made. It's not heavy weight material but it has a lining. It's a little bit large for my 4 lb. Chihuahua but I think a 5-8 lb. dog it would fit perfectly, that being said, I can still use it but I have to hoist it up a little higher and tighter for my dog but I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Easy to Use and Carry
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry my 8 weeks golden retriever puppy. He is 12lbs and the sling fits and carries him well. The sling comes in perfect condition and it is soft fabric, making you feel like you are carrying a baby which is really cute feeling. It also has an accessory hook which you can put the poop bag holder on there. My puppy loves it and he looks comfortable whenever he is in there!
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little difficult to get my 10 lb dog in it - I worry that she will slip out. She also doesn’t like it very much but it’s convenient for me and she stays quiet. I use it when I travel with her in crowded places where I don’t want her to get stepped on or eat dirty things or gets tired. My only complaint is that I wish it had a small pocket. I like the denim and brown color even for my female dog (see picture)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo....
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely not consider this for any dog over 15lbs. I have a 15lb dog and a 6lbs dog that I tried this on and the results were different. My 6lb dog sat fine in it, however 15lbs dog was so uncomfortable. Also, I'm not too sure how secure it is because the dog is literally just sitting in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: breann

customer_reviews.title: Not for rambunctious pups-Mine’s fallen too many times!
customer_reviews.text: This is very nicely made, and I’m happy it has worked so well for so many other pups! My 10lb Maltipoo - a rambunctious puppy still at 8 months- is too active and too heavy for the bag, unfortunately. He never seems to feel secure, and he has fallen out and onto his back many times. Since I’m 5’10”, this is quite a fall, particularly onto a hard floor. Though the bag is fashionable and seems well-made, it just isn’t secure enough for my dog. I simply cannot risk carrying him in it any longer. Too bad because I had high hopes for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. Texas

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable strap and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We just got it ... seems durable and sturdy. My baby Yorkie loves it so far. Keeps him from crying. He learned within 10 mins how to stick his head out of the bag and curl back in bag when he wanted to. Easy to adjust length on bag for younger kids to hold baby.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product - Pomeranian Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Alfie (lost the first one) and I love them! My Pomeranian always has to be by my side or held when we are at the cabin or family events - this makes life so much easier - my Pom also loves sleeping in this, so I never have to worry about her not wanting to use it or hop out. I will repurchase if I ever need another one again!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my small dog (6lbs), so I could carry her around in it. She was perfectly happy being in it and it would have been great but the sling was very uncomfortable for me. Even though she is only 6lbs, it put all the weight on my shoulder/neck and it bumped around like crazy on my hip as I walked. It's nice that it has a latch to hook the dog's leash to. Ultimately, it just didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Batya67

customer_reviews.title: I love this pet sling!
customer_reviews.text: Our little 12-lb Chihuahua-Jack Russell mix pup loves this bag! When she sees us pick it up, she starts hopping excitedly and can't wait to get in. We use it all the time here in NYC to take her on the subway. It's also what I use to bike with her for short distances. It's adjustable, holds up well to lots of use, and people always smile at her because she looks so cute in it.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for . Cotton is a 9lb Maltese and he fits perfectly inside with room to spare. It's really helpful when we are out in public. I believe he finds it comfortable because I caught him sleeping in it at one point. We are both happy. I WOULD SUGGEST washing it first before use. I had it shipped same day because I planned on using it ASAP so I didn't wash it. Cotton whole body was blue from the material on the inside. It looked like I had dyed him. Other than that , it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sh'e H.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a dog kangaroo mommy!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a Pomeranian who likes to go on walks but can't go very far, and she doesn't give up walking anywhere convenient either: It's usually halfway between destination and home x_x This is perfect because I get to take her on walks and then when she quits on the workout...I get to walk around like a kangaroo mom. It's like power-walking with an extra 6-7 pounds (my dog's weight...not the bag's)!
customer_reviews.author: LINNIE

customer_reviews.title: It works real good for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I have 6lb chi and yorkie mix dog. She never liked the dog purse and I was struggling and carrying her everywhere I go. (she doesn't wanna walk with leash neither) I bought this adjustable sling. It worked!!! She loved it! Now I can easily shop at stores. I think she feels like I am still holding her while she was in the sling. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: MAYUMI R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy to wear, plenty of room for pup.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is my favorite pouch. I researched a ton of them, ordered several and this one is the best. I have a 6 pound min pin and he fits perfectly. he can lay down and stretch out. If you tighten the adjustable straps, you can have your pup up higher and not bouncing off your hips while you walk. Makes a great way to bring my pup with me easily. He doesnt mind going in it and is easy to get him in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and convenient for extra small puppies that aren't adventurous enough to jump.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy was so adorable and comfortable in this at 3 months! However, once he reached 4 months, he jumped right out of the darn thing and scared me to death. I have a chipoo. (Chihuahua X toy poodle) he is 12.5 pounds now. When I was using this sling, he was around 5 or so pounds. I'm attaching a photo. Not because it will help you decide whether the sling is right for you, rather because my doggy is darling.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: My cat was not amused
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is a bit clingy, so I thought she'd loved to be toted around in the house all day. Wrong! She would not stay still enough to stay in the bag. The material was also a bit thicker, so it was a bit too warm for warmer temperatures. Other than that it seemed like a cute product.
customer_reviews.author: Chi White

customer_reviews.title: If I were 6 feet tall it might be a better product for a dog but I still do not ...
customer_reviews.text: There is no support for your dog's back. I am 5'5'' and this hung down to just above my knees so if I try to walk with my dog in this very deep bag my legs smack against it and the dog goes bouncing and every step smacks him around. If I were 6 feet tall it might be a better product for a dog but I still do not think it good for a dog to have no bottom support. My seems very wrestles and distressed at being in a deep sack with no support. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable!! The materials is like sweatshirt material. My pug puppy loves this and so do I. You can use it for travel as well by slinging it around the headrest. I recommended it to others getting pug puppues from the same litter and tbey came right on here and ordered them!! From the photos you can see he likes to slip hos head out and just see what's going on lol. He seems to really like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 pound Shih Tzu that sometimes gets stepped on, so I got this for her to stay in when I walk somewhere crowded. Carrying it on your shoulder for more than 10 minutes starts to hurt and get heavy, but the material is good quality and soft. And my baby fits in it just fine, I would say a dog/cat up to 15 pounds would have plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My dog loves it, and now I have 2 hands available and I'm not always carting him on my side, which even for a small 6lb dog, gets tiring to your arm! Perfect solution. Side note....usually I got stopped everywhere I went with my Pomeranian as he was held in my areñ so many people wanting to pet him and say hi. He loves the attention, but sometimes there is no time. Him cuddled up in his alfie sling cuts way down on that. He wants to pop his head out he can, but it draws way less attention than holding him. Great for vet visits around intimidating dogs too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I just adopted two little puppies and I got this to carry them in until I could start walking them. They were 3lbs each when I got them and they both fit with room left over. They’re about 4.5 lbs each now and they still fit but it’s snug. Luckily they like that. It’s secure enough that I didn’t feel like I needed to keep one hand on them for support.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This sling is perfect for our squirmy wormy 6lb puppy! She loved it immediately and we use it all the time. It's comfortable for her and whoever is wearing it, and she is calm and safe inside, with room to carry some other small items. I do worry about how hot she might get inside it, as it is a dark material, but so far it is just fine. The only issue I had was dye transfering onto my skin during the first use. A quick wash fixed it immediately. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle User

customer_reviews.title: One dog dislikes, the other dog love it. I guess it depends on dog personality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for daughter's 12 year old Pom who has multiple joint injuries and been unable to get around much lately. She needs to be trained to lie comfortable in this and not struggle to stand up in it. The other Pom, an 11 year old male LOVES this thing and would live in it. But then he is the snuggly kind of dog and she is the alpha demanding female who has to be in everything and thus didn't like to be IN something she can't get out and run around from. Daughter thinks after some time she will learn to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: runtymom

customer_reviews.title: Neat & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this pup sling! My poor little 6 pound chihuahua cross was attacked by a much bigger dog after an emergency vet visit & a huge vet bill later. My poor girl survived but was sooo traumatized by it all that she needed to be glued to me so I found this genius contraption. I'm disabled and I can still carry her in this easily. It is also very comfortable & people are always curious or excited when they see me with my girl Lelu.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: I put the carrier around my waist and can comfortably sit, change positions and even cross my legs ...
customer_reviews.text: My little Maltese (5 lbs) loves this carrier. It is especially helpful when I am at my desk, on the computer. I put the carrier around my waist and can comfortably sit , change positions and even cross my legs without fearing that my puppy will slip off my lap in her sleep. I have since washed it, and it looks like new. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Estremera

customer_reviews.title: great for compliant kitties
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our kitten who always wants to be around us even when there's not any good place for him and it's great. It's very comfortable to wear around even with a 9 pound cat inside, our cat also loves it. Once he's settled in he just sleeps and sleeps. I can get up and do just about anything and he just hangs out with me. It's nice and roomy so as he gets bigger he'll still be comfortable in it. Overall a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Devon Rofidal

customer_reviews.title: Pro's and con's
customer_reviews.text: Pro's The price is great It seems decently made I like that it has an adjustable strap My 5 lb chihuahua likes to ride in it Con's Can't figure out where to hook the tether other than the ring, which is not the ideal location It's a little big for my chihuahua I don't like the stretchy fabric as it sags a lot I keep hearing what sounds like stitches breaking, even when I'm careful not to adjust the strap with any weight in it Very little support for my pup due to the stretchy fabric and the design All in all it's worth the 20 dollars but I think I'll end up buying a Fundle
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: It Does What It Describes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we just got a corgi puppy and we wanted to keep her off the ground while we were hiking. She doesn't LOVE it, but she eventually accepts her fate and just goes with it. It's functional and served its purpose just fine. The strap was kind of difficult to adjust at times too which lead to it almost falling off my shoulder a few times. I just tied it onto the metal loop and it's been solid ever since. Only wish it had pockets - I'm sure they have a style with that, I was just too lazy to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a dream come true for me and my fur baby.. He is about 4lb yorkie. At first glance I thought "he was going to get lost in this thing".Not at all!! We love it. I highly recommend this I'm enjoying being hands free again. He is a skiddish little guy so another concern of mine is can he jump to his doom? Not at all.This product fits snuggly against me and he is just loving being near me and looking around with his head out from time to time. Im so happy with my purchase. This is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Pebbles loves it
customer_reviews.text: This sling is awesome. My Maltese only has 3 legs because of a birth defect and often gets really tired on our walks, she loves this thing! It's soft, cozy, and machine washable!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Product works as described, but is NOT colorfast. ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described, but is NOT colorfast in the least. The blue dye from the "denim" will leech out onto everything lighter in color it rubs on... pants, the white leather seats of your car, your dog. I'm washing it a couple times to see if the excess dye can be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: I love this sling!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Chiweenie puppy and she does very well with it! I love that it has a clip to secure her in. It’s snuggly and makes her feel safe and warm. I also like that the strap is adjustable so that any member of my family can wear it. If I had to pick a con I would have to say that it’s really not reversible. I mean, I imagine you could reverse it but after the first wash the inside started pilling so it’s really not that attractive. Overall, I’m quite satisfied with this purchase and feel it was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Eight Week Old Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Likes It
customer_reviews.text: I expected our new puppy to cry, struggle or to make multiple attempts to escape. Instead she seemed to enjoy the experience from the get go. My only concern was how soon it would take before she tore through the material as she focused her attention on chewing the at the edges. Solved the problem by offering a chew stick during our walk time. I hope we'll get many hours walking to different locations as part of her socialization process, especially when it's too early to allow her to walk in public places. Hope to use this comfortable and we'll designed shoulder carrier for many years.
customer_reviews.author: RickR

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Love that the shoulder strap is adjustable. My 10.8 lbs. He is tall, about 15” to the shoulder (long legs) About 16” should to buttock in length. He fits nicely. Strap is comfortable on my shoulder. I was looking for something to take him on outings, that would be comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Wdrop

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: My dog da Vinci is 13 pounds and fits very nicely in this carrier. He’s settled right in and loves being carried around. It’s very comfortable and doesn’t cause any neck or shoulder pain and he is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: this is sling is great! my pup doesnt LOVE sitting in it all ...
customer_reviews.text: this is sling is great! my pup doesnt LOVE sitting in it all the time but when he is tired its perfect. only downside is I wish the lining of the heather grey terry color was in the same fabric as the outside. the inside is lined with denim which seems odd. i bought the french terry because i thought it would be more comfortable for my puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice carrier. What you see is what you get. The adjustable straps are a plus. I also use it in the car and my little Chihuahua loves to snuggle in it during our car rides. Prior to the sling, he would be shaking like a leaf in the car. I can take him most places now and he enjoys looking out while having the safety of me near him.
customer_reviews.author: Blessings

product_meta.title: Alfie Pet - Chico Reversible Pet Sling Carrier
feature_bullets: Measures 9” depth and holds pets up to 12 pounds
Feature adjustable shoulder strap and safety collar hook for extra security
Perfect combination of convenience and style
Hands-free design is perfect for everyday walk and weekend adventure

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
